scripts.start:client: rm -rf apps/client/.next && yarn build:ui && cd apps/client && ENV=local npm run dev
scripts.start:ui: cd apps/uilib && ENV=local npm run start
scripts.start:client:dev: rm -rf apps/client/.next && yarn build:ui && cd apps/client && npm run build && ENV=development npm start
scripts.start:ui:dev: cd apps/uilib && ENV=development npm run start
scripts.start:client:prod: rm -rf apps/client/.next && yarn build:ui && cd apps/client && npm run build && ENV=production npm start
scripts.start:ui:prod: cd apps/uilib && ENV=production npm run start
scripts.build:client: yarn build:ui && rm -rf apps/client/.next && cd apps/client && npm run build
scripts.build:ui: cd apps/uilib && npm run build && cd ../.. && yarn remove uilib && yarn add file:./apps/uilib
scripts.init: npm i && concurrently -n "client,server,uilib" -c "#CC5A71,#3F84E5,#22AAA1" "yarn init:client" "yarn init:server" "yarn init:ui"
scripts.init:server: python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
